title: Vidar, the Northern Path of Initiation and the Three Elemental Realms
cleaned_text: Path of Initiation and the Three Elemental Realms Jul 23, 2022 12:00PM—2:00PM Location ONLINE: Central Time (US) Cost Free ($15 suggested contribution) Event Contact Andrei Onegin | Categories [Central Region US](https://anthroposophy.org/inspire_events_categories/centralregionus/), [Lecture - Presentation](https://anthroposophy.org/inspire_events_categories/lecturepresentation/), [ONLINE](https://anthroposophy.org/inspire_events_categories/online/) ONLINE PREVIEW OF ARE THORESEN'S SPEAKING TOUR IN THE US The event is organized by program committee of Chicago Rudolf Steiner Branch. Lecture is free; $15 suggested contribution. Please type "A. Thoresen" on the first line of your payment application. To make your payment, please, follow the link [www.rschicago.org/donate](https://www.rschicago.org/donate) For more information, please, contact Andrei Onegin at [aonegin@rschicago.org](mailto:aonegin@rschicago.org). Join Zoom Meeting [https://us06web.zoom.us/j/89559818503](https://us06web.zoom.us/j/89559818503) Meeting ID: 895 5981 8503 Are Thoresen, MVD, will explore insights into the Three Elemental Realms that he gained while incapacitated by Covid in 2020. Since 1981, Are has operated a holistic private veterinary practice in Sandefjord, Norway. He has also trained in acupuncture, homeopathy, and anthroposophical medicine. He has published over 25 papers and 10 books and given lectures and workshops about his research at various venues including MysTech conferences. Are's current research has focused on Vidar and Balder, who stand as guardians to the threshold of the outer etheric world to open the Northern Way of Initiation. His research covers the Vidar-school as a continuation of the Michael-school, the Christianization of bio-dynamic agriculture, and the individual qualities of the Three Elemental Realms. In his works, Are explores human potential for spiritual knowledge and new spiritual experiences in our time.
